name: Kel Leda
description:
"Terran astronaut Jack Ollin travels to planet Catyph. Unfortunately his spaceship suddenly starts to fail and the journey cannot continue as expected. He and his custom AI, DIAM, are somehow attracted by a mysterious secret on Kel Leda, a moon covered with thick ice, where scientists believe that there is a vast liquid ocean under the surface..."

Kel Leda was a project for Adventure Jam 2017, so it is a free short game created in a limited amount of time. It was made in about 10 days from scratch (ideas, story, graphics, audio, development...). Unfortunately I couldn't go as far as I had planned, there are very few interactions with the environments, so it is more a narrative experience than a puzzle game.

http://jams.gamejolt.io/advjam...

Kel Leda is an short indie game, created by one person in 10 days (game jam). It is made of pre-rendered static views like ASA: A Space Adventure (or Myst). However, here, you don't play by watching through the eyes of the hero: you make the story progress from his computer, with the help of the AI. English and French
Kel Leda is also available for free on IndieDB and Game Jolt.

This game has 1 challenging puzzle for beginners in adventure games - a walkthrough is available here.

Homepage: http://www.theblackcube.fr/kelleda
Original release date: May 19th, 2017

The Original SoundTrack of Kel Leda can be downloaded for free: Bandcamp

For more info about this project, follow The Icehouse collective on Tumblr or Facebook! http://www.theicehouse.fr

Features

  • A short and easy game in the Black Cube series
  • HD graphics, prerendered backgrounds in 1080p, developed with Visionaire Studio
  • Opening movie in CGI, traditional keyframe animation
  • A narrative story with full voice over (french)
  • English and French texts
  • Music and voices generated by the developer during the game jam
  • Includes a nice video making of (concept art, 3d research, modeling, ...)
